frontend.Controller

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • frontend.Controller.GUIController

  • public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the flow of information from the GUI to the communication with the server.
    Since:
    2020-04-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robyn Scholz, Janam Marthak, Devon Vipond
